SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Alert
The Alert class is a wrapper of common showMessageDialog calls
CreateHotel
CreateHotel contains the GUI that allows user to create hotel
DateSelector
DateSelector is a JPanel of 31 buttons corresponding to a specific date
DeluxeRoom
DeluxeRoom extends Room with the difference of its price being 20% more expensive than the base price
ExecutiveRoom
ExecutiveRoom extends Room with the difference of its price being 35% more expensive than the base price
HomeMenu
HomeMenu is the main menu of the Hotel Reservation System
Hotel
This class simulates a hotel that has rooms and can accept reservations of those rooms.
HotelCollection
This class collates hotels and contains relevant methods that require all hotels to be checeked
HotelInfo
HotelInfo displays high level hotel information
HotelReservationSystem
HotelReservationSystem is the main class and entry point for the project
ManageHotel
ManageHotel contains the GUI that allows user to manage hotel
ManageHotelPanel
ManageHotel contains the GUI component that allows user to manage hotel name, base price, and date price modifers
ManageReservations
ManageReservations contains the GUI component that allows user to select and delete reservations
ManageRooms
ManageRooms contains the GUI component that allows user to add and delete rooms
MenuCreateHotel
MenuCreateHotel is the controller class for the "Create Hotel" functionality.
MenuMakeReservation
MenuMakeReservation is the Controller class for the "Make Reservation" functionalities.
MenuManageHotel
MenuManageHotel is the Controller class for the "Manage Hotel" functionalities.
MenuViewHotel
MenuViewHotel is the controller class for anything related to the "View Hotel" functionality
MyComponents
MyComponents is a collection of standardized JComponents for better styling
MyStyles
This class contains standard fonts, colors, and other stuff
NightRate
This class contains the logic pertaining to the Date Price Modifer
Reservation
Simulates a reservation of a guest in a hotel room for a specific duration and a certain price per night.
ReservationForm
ReservationForm contains the GUI that allows user to create hotel
Reservations
Reservations allows user to select and display specific reservation information
ReservationSelector
ReservationSelector is a JPanel that enables users to select a specific reservation
Room
This class simulates a room in a hotel that a user can reserve for certain dates.
RoomAvailability
RoomAvailability allows user to select a certain date and display room availability
RoomInformation
RoomInformation allows user to select a certain room and display information of that room
RoomSelector
RoomSelector is a JPanel that enables users to select a specific room
RoomTypeSelector
RoomTypeSelector is a JPanel that enables users to select a specific roomType
ToolBar
ToolBar is a JToolBar that collates the buttons of the functionalities
UserInput
UserInput is a wrapper class of common JOptionPane calls
ViewHotel
ViewHotel contains the GUI that allows user to view hotel information
